content:
Next, we'll look at a stencil attribute that writes to the stencil buffer. Presumably, these two functions will work in tandem to create an effect.

constantOneStencil =
    StencilAttrib.make(1, StencilAttrib.SCFAlways,StencilAttrib.SOZero,
                          StencilAttrib.SOReplace,StencilAttrib.SOReplace,1,0,1)
